title: Budin (Puerto Rican Bread Pudding)
description: Budin is a traditional anise-flavored Puerto Rican bread pudding. This recipe was provided by a friend and meant to be shared. Try this tasty dessert.
directions: Step1: Bring 1 cup water to a boil in a small saucepan over high heat. Add cinnamon sticks, cloves, and anise seed. Cover and set aside to steep for 15 minutes. Step2: Meanwhile, combine 1/2 cup sugar and 2 tablespoons water in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir occasionally to dissolve sugar completely, but stop stirring once the mixture comes to a boil. Stay near the stove to monitor the color, swirling the pan gently to redistribute the sugar as the caramel begins to darken. Cook to about 310 degrees F (160 degrees C), or until the sugar turns light golden brown, then pour into a 9x5-inch loaf pan. Set aside to allow caramel to harden. Step3: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Step4: Remove crust from day-old bread, tear bread into cubes, and place into a large mixing bowl. Strain spice tea through a fine mesh sieve to remove spices. Add to bread along with evaporated milk. Stir to evenly moisten and set aside for 10 minutes. Step5: While the bread mixture sits, whisk eggs in a large mixing bowl along with remaining 1 1/2 cups sugar, vanilla, salt, and melted butter. Stir in moistened bread mixture until evenly mixed. Pour into the loaf pan over the caramel. Step6: Line a roasting pan with a damp kitchen towel. Place the loaf pan on the towel, inside the roasting pan, and place roasting pan on oven rack. Fill the roasting pan with boiling water to reach halfway up the sides of the loaf pan. Step7: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. Step8: Cool in the pan for about an hour, then refrigerate until cold, 2 hours more. Step9: When ready, invert the budin onto a serving plate. The caramel will have turned to syrup and will cover the budin like a sauce.
ingredients: 1 cup water, 2 (3 inch) cinnamon sticks, 15 whole cloves, 1 teaspoon anise seed, 2 cups white sugar, divided, 2 tablespoons water, 1 (1 pound) loaf day-old bread, 4 cups evaporated milk, 4 large eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 0.75 teaspoon salt, 0.25 cup butter, melted

title: Hasty Chocolate Pudding
description: This easy chocolate pudding recipe is quick to make in the microwave with sugar, cocoa powder, cornstarch, milk, and vanilla in less than 10 minutes.
directions: Step1: Whisk together sugar, cocoa, and cornstarch in a microwave-safe bowl. Whisk in milk, a little at a time, until no dry lumps remain. Step2: Cook in the microwave on high for 3 minutes. Stir well. Continue cooking and stirring at 1-minute intervals until shiny and thick, 2 to 4 minutes. Mix in vanilla. Step3: Press a piece of plastic wrap directly on surface of pudding to prevent skin from forming. Place in the refrigerator to chill. Serve cold.
ingredients: 0.5 cup white sugar, 0.33333334326744 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 2 cups milk, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract

title: Almond Milk Instant Pudding
description: This instant vanilla pudding with almond milk comes together in a matter of minutes for the perfect dairy-free sweet treat or delicious dessert.
directions: Step1: Pour 1 cup almond milk into a small saucepan. Add cornstarch and heat over medium heat. Cook, stirring constantly, until bubbly, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat; keep stirring for 30 seconds. Step2: Pour remaining almond milk into a bowl; add pudding mix. Mix with an electric mixer on low speed until very thick, about 1 minute. Add cornstarch mixture to pudding mixture; mix at low speed for 1 minute more. Step3: Transfer pudding to 4 individual serving bowls. Cover and refrigerate if desired.
ingredients: 2 cups almond milk, divided, 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix, 2 teaspoons cornstarch

title: Baked Pumpkin Custard from EAGLE BRAND
description: These pumpkin custards are smooth, creamy, and full of holiday flavor. Your guests can satisfy their pumpkin cravings with these individual desserts.
directions: Step1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Step2: Whisk eggs together in a large bowl. Stir in pumpkin and pumpkin pie spice until blended. Whisk in condensed milk, milk, vanilla, and salt until blended. Pour into six 6-ounce custard cups. Step3: Place custard cups in a 9x13-inch baking dish. Place the dish on the center rack in the middle of the preheated oven. Pour boiling water into the pan around custard cups to a depth of 1 1/4 inches. Step4: Bake until the centers are almost set, about 35 minutes. Step5: Remove custard cups from the baking dish and set on a wire rack to cool. Serve warm or cold. Step6: Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon just before serving.
ingredients: 3 large eggs, 1 cup 100% pure pumpkin, 1.5 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRANDÂ® Sweetened Condensed Milk, 1.3333333730698 cups whole milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 0.25 teaspoon salt, 0.5 cup whipped cream, or to taste, 1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste

title: Baked Flan
description: This flan is baked in a water bath to achieve a deliciously silky texture. It's quick and easy to prepare in a blender, and great served warm or cold.
directions: Step1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Step2: Heat sugar in a small nonstick saucepan over medium heat until completely dissolved; shake and swirl the pan until sugar has caramelized and is a dark golden brown color; pour into a 1 1/2-quart baking dish, and swirl to coat the bottom of the dish evenly. Step3: Combine cream, condensed milk, eggs, milk, and vanilla in a blender; blend on high for one minute. Pour mixture over caramelized sugar. Step4: Place the baking dish into a deep roasting pan; pour in enough boiling water to come 1 inch up the sides of the dish. Step5: Bake in preheated oven until flan is set, 50 to 60 minutes.
ingredients: 0.66666668653488 cup white sugar, 2 cups heavy cream, 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, 5 large eggs, 1 cup milk, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract

title: Sweet Rice Pudding
description: Sweet rice, known as arroz con leche, is a lovely custard-like Mexican rice pudding with raisins, lightly flavored with cream, vanilla, and cinnamon.
directions: Step1: Bring water, rice, and butter to a boil in a large saucepan over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes. Step2: Whisk together 2 cups milk, sugar, egg, flour, and vanilla in a bowl; pour over cooked rice in the saucepan and stir to combine. Bring to a simmer over low heat and cook, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes. Step3: Stir in remaining 1 cup milk, cream, raisins, and cinnamon until thoroughly mixed. Let cool for a few minutes. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: 2 cups water, 1 cup uncooked long-grain white rice, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 3 cups whole milk, divided, 0.33333334326744 cup white sugar, 1 large egg, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 1.5 teaspoons vanilla extract, 0.66666668653488 cup heavy cream, 0.5 cup raisins, 0.5 teaspoon ground cinnamon

title: Dirt Pudding
description: This dirt pudding is a simple, kid-friendly dessert made with a cream cheese-vanilla pudding, whipped topping, and chocolate sandwich cookie crumbs.
directions: Step1: Whisk milk and pudding mix in a large bowl until softly set, about 2 minutes. The pudding will thicken as it stands. Step2: Beat confectioners' sugar, cream cheese, and butter in a separate bowl until smooth and creamy. Stir cream cheese mixture into pudding until thoroughly combined; gently fold in frozen whipped topping. Step3: Place 1/2 of the cookie crumbs into the bottom of a 9x12-inch dish; spread evenly. Cover cookie crumbs with pudding mixture and top with remaining crumbs, covering completely. Step4: Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 3 cups milk, 2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant French vanilla pudding mix, 1 cup confectioners' sugar, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 0.25 cup butter, softened, 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed, 1 (14 ounce) package chocolate cream-filled sandwich cookies, crushed (divided)

title: Caremel special Pudding
description: Caremel Special Pudding  is a smooth and creamy custard topped with crisp, caramelized sugar. A simple but elegant dinner party dessert that's sure to impress!
directions: Step1: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Step2: Whisk egg yolks, 4 tablespoons white sugar, and vanilla extract in a mixing bowl until thick and creamy; set aside. Step3: Pour cream into a saucepan and stir over low heat until it almost comes to a boil. Step4: Whisk cream into egg yolk mixture; beat until combined. Step5: Pour mixture into the top pan of a double boiler. Stir over simmering water until mixture lightly coats the back of a spoon, about 3 minutes. Step6: Pour into a shallow heat-proof dish. Step7: Bake in the preheated oven until custard is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool to room temperature, then refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour or overnight. Step8: Turn the oven to broil. Step9: Combine remaining 2 tablespoons white sugar and brown sugar in a small bowl. Sprinkle mixture evenly over custard. Step10: Place dish under the broiler until sugar melts and caramelizes, about 2 minutes. Watch carefully so as not to burn. Step11: Allow to cool slightly, then refrigerate until custard is set again, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 6 egg yolks, 6 tablespoons white sugar, divided, 0.5 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.5 cups heavy cream, 2 tablespoons brown sugar

title: Rice Cooker Rice Pudding
description: Cook rice pudding in a rice cooker in under 30 minutes with four simple ingredients: milk, rice, sugar, and cinnamon, then chill and serve it cold.
directions: Step1: Stir 5 1/2 cups milk, rice, sugar, and cinnamon together in a rice cooker. Cover and cook for one cycle until tender and creamy, about 20 minutes. Stir in remaining 2 1/2 cups milk. Step2: Transfer to a bowl and let cool to room temperature, about 30 minutes. Cover and refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 8 cups skim milk, divided, 2 cups short-grain white rice, 1 cup white sugar, 0.5 teaspoon ground cinnamon
prep: Stir 5 1/2 cups milk, rice, sugar, and cinnamon together in a rice cooker. Cover and cook for one cycle until tender and creamy, about 20 minutes. Stir in remaining 2 1/2 cups milk.

title: Mud and Worms Pudding
description: Dirt and worms is a tasty bowl of chocolate mud pudding with candy worms sticking out â perfect for Halloween, and so easy even the kids can make it.
directions: Step1: Place cookies into a resealable plastic bag and crush with a rolling pin into crumbs. Step2: Whisk together pudding mix with milk in a bowl, stirring for 2 minutes. Step3: Sprinkle about 1/3 of the crushed cookie crumbs into the bottom of a serving bowl and spoon chocolate pudding over crumbs. Smooth out the top of the pudding, then top with the rest of the chocolate cookie crumbs to resemble dirt. Step4: Poke gummy worms halfway into the dirt. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: 12 chocolate cream-filled sandwich cookies, 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix, 2 cups milk, 1 (3 ounce) package gummy worms candy

title: Blanc Mange (English Style Pudding)
description: This dessert is known as Cramma in southern Italy where it is very popular. I hope you will make this dessert and like it. ENJOY!!!.
directions: Step1: Place 1 cup of the milk into a saucepan. Add lemon peel and cinnamon sticks. Bring milk to a simmer over medium heat. Step2: Meanwhile, in a small bowl, whisk together the cornstarch and sugar. Whisk remaining milk into the cornstarch mixture. When the milk in the pan begins to simmer, pour the cornstarch mixture into the saucepan in a thin steady stream. Whisk vigorously and increase heat just a bit to bring the mixture to a gentle boil. Allow the mixture to boil for about 20 seconds while continuing to whisk, then remove from heat. Remove the lemon peel and cinnamon sticks. Stir in the pinch of cinnamon and, if using, the vanilla. Step3: Pour into a dish or mold, and refrigerate for at least 6 hours, or overnight. Garnish with shaved chocolate just before serving.
ingredients: 3 cups milk, divided, 0.25 cup cornstarch, 0.5 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 cinnamon sticks, 1 lemon peel, cut into strips, 1 pinch ground cinnamon, 3 ounces shaved semisweet chocolate, for garnish

title: Creamy Caramel Flan Pudding
description: This flan recipe uses condensed and evaporated milk with cream cheese for a rich and delicious baked egg custard with a wonderfully thick texture.
directions: Step1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Step2: Cook sugar in a small, heavy saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until golden. Pour caramel into a 10-inch round baking dish, tilting to coat the bottom and sides. Set aside. Step3: Beat cream cheese in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in eggs, one at a time, until well incorporated. Mix in milks and vanilla until smooth. Pour into the caramel-coated baking dish. Step4: Line a roasting pan with a damp kitchen towel. Place the baking dish inside the roasting pan on the towel, then place the roasting pan on the oven rack. Fill the roasting pan with boiling water to reach halfway up the sides of the baking dish. Step5: Bake in the preheated oven until the center is just set, 50 to 60 minutes. Cool on a wire rack for 1 hour, then place in the refrigerator until completely cooled, 8 hours to overnight. Step6: To unmold, run a knife around the edges of the baking dish and invert onto a rimmed serving platter.
ingredients: 0.75 cup white sugar, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 5 large eggs, 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, 1 (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

title: Homemade Banana Pudding
description: A homemade banana pudding recipe from scratch. This decadent dessert features vanilla pudding layered with vanilla wafers and sliced bananas.
directions: Step1: Combine sugar, flour, and salt together in a medium saucepan. Add eggs and stir well. Stir in milk, and cook over low heat, stirring constantly. Step2: When the mixture has thickened enough to coat the back of a metal spoon, remove from heat and continue to stir, cooling slightly. Stir in butter and vanilla until smooth. Step3: Layer pudding with bananas and vanilla wafers in a serving dish. Chill at least 1 hour in the refrigerator before serving.
ingredients: 0.66666668653488 cup white sugar, 0.33333334326744 cup all-purpose flour, 0.25 teaspoon salt, 3 eggs, beaten, 2 cups milk, 2 tablespoons butter, softened, 0.5 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 bananas, peeled and sliced, 0.5 (12 ounce) package vanilla wafer cookies

title: Maple Pudding
description: A rich maple pudding made with real maple syrup is a simple, delicious dessert. It also makes an excellent trifle filling when layered with pumpkin cake and whipped cream.
directions: Step1: Whisk cornstarch, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt together in a saucepan. Whisk in egg yolks and maple syrup until smooth. Gradually pour in half-and-half, whisking constantly until thoroughly combined. Step2: Cook over low heat, whisking constantly, until mixture thickens, about 10 minutes. Remove pot from heat, and stir in butter, maple extract, and vanilla extract, until butter is melted and incorporated. Step3: Pour mixture through a fine mesh strainer set over a bowl; use a spatula to press mixture through the sieve. Step4: Place a piece of plastic wrap over the top of the pudding, making sure it touches the surface to prevent a skin from forming. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 egg yolks, 1 cup pure maple syrup, 2 cups half-and-half, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1 teaspoon maple extract, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

title: Brown Sugar and Cinnamon Rice Pudding
description: Mix instant rice with brown sugar, cinnamon, and milk, and you'll be rewarded with a deliciously tasty pudding that's ready for dessert in just minutes!
directions: Step1: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan. Add rice, butter, and salt; cook and stir until butter melts, then cover the saucepan and remove from the heat. Set aside until water is absorbed, about 5 minutes. Step2: Stir milk, brown sugar, cornstarch, and vanilla into rice; bring to a simmer over medium heat while stirring. Cook until rice has the consistency of loose oatmeal, about 5 minutes. Ladle pudding into bowls and dust with cinnamon.
ingredients: 2 cups water, 2 cups instant white rice (such as MinuteÂ®), 0.5 teaspoon butter, 0.125 teaspoon salt, 1 cup milk, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, or to taste, 1 teaspoon cornstarch, 0.5 teaspoon vanilla extract, 0.5 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or more to taste

title: Southern-Style Baked Banana Pudding
description: This baked banana pudding from Chef John makes a luscious marriage of ripe bananas and pudding-soaked vanilla wafers â baked with a meringue topping.
directions: Step1: Separate eggs, placing the whites in the bowl of a stand mixer and the yolks into a saucepan. Step2: Prepare the custard: Add sugar, salt, and 1/3 cup plus 1 tablespoon flour to the yolks. Splash in about 1/4 of the milk and start blending mixture with a whisk. Pour in remaining milk and whisk until smooth. Step3: Cook and stir mixture over medium heat until hot to the touch, occasionally dipping your finger in to test. Whisk constantly until custard is thick enough to form ribbons. Step4: Remove custard from heat and add banana liqueur, vanilla, then cold butter. Whisk until butter dissolves. Set custard aside. Step5: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Step6: Begin to assemble the pudding: Toss banana slices with lemon juice. Step7: Spread 1/4 of the custard over the bottom of a baking dish. Add a single layer of vanilla wafers. Cover with 1/2 of the bananas and spread 1/2 of the remaining custard on top. Add another layer of vanilla wafers, using slightly fewer this time. Top with remaining bananas and custard. Smooth the top and tap dish against the counter to settle the pudding. Step8: Make the meringue topping: Add cream of tartar to the egg whites. Beat using the whisk attachment until foamy. Gradually add sugar and beat until stiff, but not dry, peaks form. Spread meringue over the pudding using a soft spatula, creating ridges for contrast. Step9: Bake in the preheated oven until meringue is nicely browned, 7 to 10 minutes. Serve warm or chilled.
ingredients: 4 large eggs, 0.5 cup white sugar, 0.25 teaspoon salt, 0.33333334326744 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 2 cups milk, 1 tablespoon banana liqueur, 0.5 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 tablespoon cold butter, 3 very ripe bananas, or more to taste, sliced, 1.5 teaspoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, 1 (12 ounce) package miniature vanilla wafers, 0.125 teaspoon cream of tartar, 2 tablespoons white sugar

title: Egg Custard pudding
description: This baked egg custard recipe is a classic comfort dish and comes together easily with just a few simple ingredients. A delicious sweet treat.
directions: Step1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Step2: Whisk milk, eggs, sugar, salt, and vanilla together in a bowl until completely combined. Pour egg mixture into 6 custard cups; sprinkle tops with nutmeg. Step3: Place cups in a baking pan and fill the pan with enough hot water to reach halfway up the sides of the custard cups. Step4: Bake in the preheated oven until custards are set, about 1 hour. Cool completely.
ingredients: 2 cups milk, 2 eggs, beaten, 0.5 cup white sugar, 1 pinch salt, 1 dash vanilla extract, 1 pinch ground nutmeg

title: Flan Mexicano Pudding (Mexican Flan)
description: This Mexican flan recipe makes a creamy, orange-scented custard with a golden syrupy topping of caramelized sugar in this treasured family dessert.
directions: Step1: Place sugar into a heavy saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring constantly, until sugar melts and turns a golden amber color, about 10 minutes. Watch carefully once syrup begins to change color because it burns quickly. Carefully pour caramel syrup into a flan mold. Set aside to cool. Step2: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place an oven rack in the middle position. Step3: Place sweetened condensed milk, whole milk, eggs, egg yolks, orange juice, orange peel, vanilla, and cornstarch into a blender; blend until smooth, about 1 minute. Pour in cream and pulse several times to incorporate. Pour mixture over cooled caramel syrup in the flan mold. Step4: Line a roasting pan with a damp kitchen towel. Place the filled flan mold carefully on the towel in the roasting pan, then place the roasting pan on the oven rack. Fill the roasting pan with enough boiling water to reach halfway up the sides of the flan mold. Step5: Bake in the preheated oven until the center of flan is set but still slightly jiggles when nudged, 45 minutes to 1 hour. Let cool, then refrigerate for at least 4 hours. Step6: To serve, run a sharp paring knife around the inside of the mold to release flan. Place a serving plate on the mold, then flip the mold over. Gently lift the mold to release flan and allow caramel syrup to cascade over custard. Remove the mold.
ingredients: 1 cup white sugar, 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, 1 cup whole milk, 3 large eggs, 3 large egg yolks, 0.25 cup freshly squeezed orange juice, 1 tablespoon grated orange peel, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1 cup heavy cream

title: Banana Pudding with Chessmen Cookies
description: This banana pudding with Pepperidge FarmÂ® ChessmenÂ® cookies is simple to make and will become a family favorite!
directions: Step1: Combine milk and pudding mix in a bowl. Whisk for 2 minutes. Step2: Combine condensed milk and cream cheese in a separate bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth. Fold in whipped topping. Slowly fold in pudding mixture. Step3: Layer 1/2 of the cookies in the bottom of a 9x13-inch pan. Top with 1/2 of the bananas, 1/2 of the pudding mixture, remaining bananas, remaining pudding mixture, and remaining cookies. Step4: Chill for 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 2 cups cold milk, 2 (3.4 ounce) packages instant French vanilla pudding mix, 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 1 (8 ounce) container whipped topping (such as Cool WhipÂ®), 2 (7.25 ounce) packages butter cookies (such as Pepperidge FarmÂ® ChessmenÂ®), 6 medium bananas, sliced

title: Simple Custard pudding
description: This simple custard recipe uses eggs, milk, butter, cornstarch, and just enough sugar to make a not-too-sweet dessert that's perfect hot or cold.
directions: Step1: Place milk, vanilla extract, and butter in a saucepan. Cook and stir over medium heat until simmering; remove from heat before it comes to a boil. Step2: Whisk eggs, sugar, and cornstarch together in a bowl until sugar dissolves. Step3: Set the saucepan back over low heat. Pour in egg mixture slowly, whisking constantly, until custard thickens enough to coat the bottom of a spoon, 5 to 10 minutes. Step4: Serve warm or transfer custard into a large bowl, cover, and allow to cool before chilling.
ingredients: 4 cups whole milk, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon butter, 4 eggs, 0.5 cup white sugar, 3 tablespoons cornstarch

title: The Best Banana Pudding
description: This banana pudding recipe is made with pudding mix and condensed milk. Layer it with vanilla wafers and banana slices for an easy no-cook dessert.
directions: Step1: Gather all ingredients. Step2: Place milk and pudding mix in a large bowl; beat with a whisk for 2 minutes. Blend in condensed milk until smooth. Step3: Stir in vanilla, then fold in whipped topping. Step4: Layer wafers, banana slices, and pudding mixture in a glass serving bowl. Step5: Chill. When ready to serve top with extra crushed wafers. Step6: Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 cups cold milk, 1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix, 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed, 1 (16 ounce) package vanilla wafers, 14 bananas, sliced

title: Best Old-Fashioned Creamy Rice Pudding
description: Rice pudding with cooked rice is quick and easy to make on the stovetop. An egg, butter, and vanilla add flavor and richness to this classic dessert.
directions: Step1: Place cooked rice in a medium saucepan. Add 1 1/2 cups milk and salt; cook and stir until thick and creamy, 15 to 20 minutes. Step2: Add remaining 1/2 cup milk, golden raisins, beaten egg, and white sugar; continue cooking, stirring continuously, until well blended, 2 to 3 minutes more. Step3: Remove saucepan from heat; stir in butter and vanilla extract.
ingredients: 1.5 cups cooked rice, 2 cups milk, divided, 0.25 teaspoon salt, 0.66666668653488 cup golden raisins, 1 egg, beaten, 0.33333334326744 cup white sugar, 1 tablespoon butter, 0.5 teaspoon vanilla extract

title: Chocolate Avocado Pudding
description: This avocado pudding made with coconut milk, brown sugar, and cocoa powder is flavored with cinnamon and vanilla for a rich, vegan chocolate mousse.
directions: Step1: Blend avocados, cocoa powder, brown sugar, coconut milk, vanilla, and cinnamon in a blender until smooth. Transfer pudding to a container with a lid, then refrigerate until chilled, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 large avocados - peeled, pitted, and cubed, 0.5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 0.5 cup brown sugar, 0.33333334326744 cup coconut milk, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 pinch ground cinnamon

title: Kheer (Rice Pudding)
description: This easy kheer recipe makes four flavorful bowls of rice pudding made with coconut milk, raisins, cardamom, pistachios, and toasted almonds.
directions: Step1: Bring coconut milk, milk, and sugar to a boil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice, reduce the heat to low, and simmer until mixture thickens and rice is tender, about 20 minutes. Step2: Stir in raisins, cardamom, and rose water; cook for a few more minutes. Ladle into serving bowls and garnish with almonds and pistachios.
ingredients: 2 cups coconut milk, 2 cups milk, 3 tablespoons white sugar, 0.5 cup basmati rice, 0.25 cup raisins, 0.5 teaspoon ground cardamom, 0.5 teaspoon rose water, 0.25 cup sliced almonds, toasted, 0.25 cup chopped pistachio nuts
